dt: {bc}to greatly increase the size of (something or someone) {bc}to make (something or someone) {d_link|supersized|supersized}

dt.t: {wi}Supersize{/wi} it! That's the meaty mantra for fast-food chains this summer as they keep introducing larger, fattier and more outrageous sandwiches.
Americans aren't {wi}supersizing{/wi} portions just at fast-food restaurants, they're doing it in their own dining rooms.
… Fashion is out to {wi}supersize{/wi} you. … Magnification of your top half is highly probable, and quite possibly (take a deep breath) even your bottom half.

shortdef: to greatly increase the size of (something or someone) : to make (something or someone) supersized

dt.t: Some experts blame ever-increasing portion sizes and the proliferation of tasty, high-calorie fast foods that make it all too easy to eat a day's worth of calories in one {wi}supersize{/wi} meal.
Though the sun finally came out, the damage from the {wi}supersize{/wi} storm will be long-lasting.
[Louis] Kahn was an extraordinary man, with {wi}supersize{/wi} talent, who left a deeply admired and profoundly influential architectural legacy.
